column1: * 1956 - The second episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings airs on the BBC Third Programme.

column4: Owen Barfield and Christopher Tolkien attend the funeral of C.S. Lewis.

column1: * 1964 - The 1964 BBC Interview with J.R.R. Tolkien was made.
* 1974 - Bilbos Last Song is published as a poster.
* 1984 - The Book of Lost Tales Part Two is published in the US.
